tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE authorized_users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    password VARCHAR(100),
    access_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE user_access_rights (
  user_id INT,
  system_id INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES authorized_users(user_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_system_id FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES smart_home_systems(system_id),
  PRIMARY KEY (user_id, system_id)
);

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  system_id INT,
  access_time TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES authorized_users(user_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_system_id FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES smart_home_systems(system_id)
);

CREATE TABLE authentication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    login_time TIMESTAMP,
    logout_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES authorized_users(user_id)
);
